Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.client.network

Class ClientManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.client.network.ClientManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
ClientManager class that starts the connection thread(ClientBG), and then handles updates on the CLI or the GUI

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ClientManager​(int chosenInterface)
    Not default constructor for ClientManager class that initializes the game on your chosen interface CLI or GUI.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean containsEndGameMessage()
    This method is used to check if there already EndGameMessages on the stack.
    void flushStack()
    This method is used to eliminate all the messages from the stack.
    GraphicHandler getGraphicHandler()  
    void handleEvent()
    This method checks if there are messages in the messageBox and if there are some of these it calls the update on the graphic handler.
    ServerMessage popMessageFromBox()
    Synchronized method to remove a message from the message box.
    void pushMessageInBox​(ServerMessage message)
    Synchronized method to add message in the message box.
    void run()
    Override of the run method, here the client manager creates the network handler(ClientBG), initializes the chosen interface and then handles events for the entire duration of the game, that events are the arrivals of messages from the server.
    void setActive​(boolean active)
    Setter method for the boolean variable isActive.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientManager

      public ClientManager​(int chosenInterface)
      Not default constructor for ClientManager class that initializes the game on your chosen interface CLI or GUI.
      Parameters:
      chosenInterface - can be 1 for the CLI or 2 for the GUI

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Override of the run method, here the client manager creates the network handler(ClientBG), initializes the chosen interface and then handles events for the entire duration of the game, that events are the arrivals of messages from the server.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • handleEvent

      public void handleEvent() throws QuitPlayerException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      This method checks if there are messages in the messageBox and if there are some of these it calls the update on the graphic handler.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when the thread running is interrupted.
      QuitPlayerException - if a player in the input writes quit to leave the game

    • setActive

      public void setActive​(boolean active)
      Setter method for the boolean variable isActive.
      Parameters:
      active - false to stop the run of the thread

    • pushMessageInBox

      public void pushMessageInBox​(ServerMessage message)
      Synchronized method to add message in the message box.
      Parameters:
      message - is the message that will be pushed on the stack of the ClientManager

    • containsEndGameMessage

      public boolean containsEndGameMessage()
      This method is used to check if there already EndGameMessages on the stack.
      Returns:
      true if there are already EndGameMessages on the stack, false otherwise

    • flushStack

      public void flushStack()
      This method is used to eliminate all the messages from the stack. This is done in case it could be necessary to eliminate all previous and useless messages arrived.

    • popMessageFromBox

      public ServerMessage popMessageFromBox() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Synchronized method to remove a message from the message box.
      Returns:
      the removed message
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when the thread that is running is interrupted.

    • getGraphicHandler

      public GraphicHandler getGraphicHandler()
